sakai:title: Twitter GET Status
sakai:shortDescription: Get the content of a remote RSS feed.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "rss", "description" : "(Required) The URL of the RSS feed."}
sakai:description: Proxies Get status to the twitter API as GET http://localhost:8080/var/proxy/twitter/status.json?user=adaHopper
sakai:response: This is an example of the response you receive.
